languages.text: "Значит, вот как все обернулось. Смерть Его Светлости — великая трагедия для всей династии. И лишь мысль о том, что Лорд-капитан погиб в яростном бою с врагом, как того и желал, смягчает бесконечность моей скорби".

traits.locale_text: "Значит, вот как все обернулось. Смерть Его Светлости — великая трагедия для всей династии. И лишь мысль о том, что Лорд-капитан погиб в яростном бою с врагом, как того и желал, смягчает бесконечность моей скорби".
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "So, this is how things turned out. The death of His Lordship is a great tragedy for the entire dynasty. The vastness of my grief is mitigated only by the knowledge that the Lord Captain perished in a fierce battle. He would have it no other way."
languages.original_text: "Значит, вот как все обернулось. Смерть Его Светлости — великая трагедия для всей династии. И лишь мысль о том, что Лорд-капитан погиб в яростном бою с врагом, как того и желал, смягчает бесконечность моей скорби".

traits.locale_text: "So, this is how things turned out. The death of His Lordship is a great tragedy for the entire dynasty. The vastness of my grief is mitigated only by the knowledge that the Lord Captain perished in a fierce battle. He would have it no other way."
traits.speaker: Player

traits.locale_text: "So, this is how things turned out. The death of His Lordship is a great tragedy for the entire dynasty. The vastness of my grief is mitigated only by the knowledge that the Lord Captain perished in a fierce battle. He would have it no other way."
traits.speaker: Player

traits.locale_text: "So, this is how things turned out. The death of His Lordship is a great tragedy for the entire dynasty. The vastness of my grief is mitigated only by the knowledge that the Lord Captain perished in a fierce battle. He would have it no other way."
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: « Voilà donc ce qui s'est passé. La mort de Sa Seigneurie est une tragédie pour la dynastie tout entière. Malgré le chagrin vertigineux qui m'étreint le cœur, je trouve un peu de réconfort dans le fait que le seigneur-capitaine ait péri en livrant bataille. C'est ce qu'il aurait souhaité. »
languages.original_text: "So, this is how things turned out. The death of His Lordship is a great tragedy for the entire dynasty. The vastness of my grief is mitigated only by the knowledge that the Lord Captain perished in a fierce battle. He would have it no other way."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà donc ce qui s'est passé. La mort de Sa Seigneurie est une tragédie pour la dynastie tout entière. Malgré le chagrin vertigineux qui m'étreint le cœur, je trouve un peu de réconfort dans le fait que le seigneur-capitaine ait péri en livrant bataille. C'est ce qu'il aurait souhaité. »
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: “原来是这样。舰长大人死了，这对整个王朝都是个可怕的悲剧。不过，得知舰长大人是在激烈的战斗中牺牲，我悲痛的心得到了些许安慰。能在战斗中壮烈牺牲，肯定也是他的心愿吧。”
languages.original_text: "So, this is how things turned out. The death of His Lordship is a great tragedy for the entire dynasty. The vastness of my grief is mitigated only by the knowledge that the Lord Captain perished in a fierce battle. He would have it no other way."

traits.locale_text: “原来是这样。舰长大人死了，这对整个王朝都是个可怕的悲剧。不过，得知舰长大人是在激烈的战斗中牺牲，我悲痛的心得到了些许安慰。能在战斗中壮烈牺牲，肯定也是他的心愿吧。”
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "So ist es also gekommen. Der Tod seiner Lordschaft ist eine große Tragödie für die gesamte Dynastie. Die Tiefe meiner Trauer wird nur durch das Wissen gelindert, dass der Lord Captain in einem erbitterten Kampf gefallen ist. Anders hätte er es nicht gewollt."
languages.original_text: "So, this is how things turned out. The death of His Lordship is a great tragedy for the entire dynasty. The vastness of my grief is mitigated only by the knowledge that the Lord Captain perished in a fierce battle. He would have it no other way."

traits.locale_text: "So ist es also gekommen. Der Tod seiner Lordschaft ist eine große Tragödie für die gesamte Dynastie. Die Tiefe meiner Trauer wird nur durch das Wissen gelindert, dass der Lord Captain in einem erbitterten Kampf gefallen ist. Anders hätte er es nicht gewollt."
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: «Así que eso es lo que ha sucedido. La muerte de su señoría supone un gran pesar para toda la dinastía. Solo puedo aliviar mi pesar sabiendo que el Lord Capitán pereció en una feroz batalla. Él no lo hubiera querido de otra manera».
languages.original_text: "So, this is how things turned out. The death of His Lordship is a great tragedy for the entire dynasty. The vastness of my grief is mitigated only by the knowledge that the Lord Captain perished in a fierce battle. He would have it no other way."

traits.locale_text: «Así que eso es lo que ha sucedido. La muerte de su señoría supone un gran pesar para toda la dinastía. Solo puedo aliviar mi pesar sabiendo que el Lord Capitán pereció en una feroz batalla. Él no lo hubiera querido de otra manera».
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 「これが事の成り行きです。陛下の死は、王朝全体にとっての大きな悲劇です。ロード・キャプテンが熾烈な戦闘の果てに散ったことを知って、私の悲しみは多少和らげられました。彼にとって、それ以外の最期は考えられません」
languages.original_text: "So, this is how things turned out. The death of His Lordship is a great tragedy for the entire dynasty. The vastness of my grief is mitigated only by the knowledge that the Lord Captain perished in a fierce battle. He would have it no other way."

traits.locale_text: 「これが事の成り行きです。陛下の死は、王朝全体にとっての大きな悲劇です。ロード・キャプテンが熾烈な戦闘の果てに散ったことを知って、私の悲しみは多少和らげられました。彼にとって、それ以外の最期は考えられません」
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Demek öyle. Lord Hazretleri'nin ölümü, tüm hanedanlık için büyük bir faciadır. Lord Kaptan'ı çetin bir çatışmada kaybetmiş olmamız, bu acı günde bir nebze teselli sayılır. Kendisi de başka türlü ölmek istemezdi."
languages.original_text: "So, this is how things turned out. The death of His Lordship is a great tragedy for the entire dynasty. The vastness of my grief is mitigated only by the knowledge that the Lord Captain perished in a fierce battle. He would have it no other way."
